scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder mainly contains receipts and account statements documenting purchases made by Mrs. Ellen Howard Morgan and her daughter, Miss Ellen "Nellie" Key Howard Morgan, from businesses in Lexington, Kentucky, along with checks written to pay for those purchases. This folder also has a handwritten copy of a clipping from a Baltimore newspaper reporting on the death of Joseph Hopper Nicholson (March 5, 1917).
